Episodes.description: A new girl arrives at Springfield Elementary and becomes instantly popular, with Lisa forced to organize a dance at her school, while Homer and Bart try to start their own grease business.
Episodes.title: Lard of the Dance

Episodes.description: Homer's midlife crisis leads to a disastrous attempt at being an inventor.
Episodes.title: The Wizard of Evergreen Terrace

Episodes.description: When Bart accidentally kills a mother bird, he tries to make amends by raising the eggs.
Episodes.title: Bart the Mother

Episodes.description: Homer receives an evil hair transplant, Bart and Lisa get trapped in an Itchy and Scratchy cartoon, and Maggie is revealed to be an alien.
Episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror IX

Episodes.description: Homer becomes a Hollywood insider when he befriends Alec Baldwin and Kim Basinger.
Episodes.title: When You Dish Upon a Star

Episodes.description: Homer becomes a hippie after a revelation about his middle name.
Episodes.title: D'oh-in' in the Wind

Episodes.description: Lisa cheats on a test and has a moral crisis when her perfect score qualifies the school for grant money. Meanwhile, Homer cannot bring himself to cook a lobster, so he adopts it as a pet instead.
Episodes.title: Lisa Gets an "A"

Episodes.description: Homer gets cold feet before a transplant operation which could save Grampa's life.
Episodes.title: Homer Simpson in: "Kidney Trouble"

Episodes.description: Homer deals with corruption when he becomes Mayor Quimby's bodyguard.
Episodes.title: Mayored to the Mob

Episodes.description: When Homer takes Ned to Las Vegas in an attempt to get him to loosen up, the two end up drunkenly marrying a pair of cocktail waitresses.
Episodes.title: Viva Ned Flanders

Episodes.description: The children of Springfield revolt after a curfew is enforced.
Episodes.title: Wild Barts Can't Be Broken

Episodes.description: Homer and his friends head to the Superbowl, but are forced to sneak in when they discover their tickets are counterfeit.
Episodes.title: Sunday, Cruddy Sunday

Episodes.description: After a dimwitted TV character is coincidentally named Homer Simpson, Homer changes his name to Max Power.
Episodes.title: Homer to the Max

Episodes.description: The husbands of Springfield plot revenge after Apu outshines them on Valentine's Day.
Episodes.title: I'm with Cupid

Episodes.description: Marge's new SUV gives her a potent case of road rage.
Episodes.title: Marge Simpson in: "Screaming Yellow Honkers"

Episodes.description: When Homer installs a cell phone tower on his roof to pay for his destruction of the Bill Of Rights, the machinery is put in Lisa's room, forcing her to move in with Bart. When the new living arrangement causes her stress, Homer agrees to try sensory deprivation therapy with her.
Episodes.title: Make Room for Lisa

Episodes.description: Homer completes a cross country delivery for a trucker who dies before completing it, and takes Bart along for the ride. Meanwhile, Marge and Lisa experience problems with a novelty doorbell they purchase.
Episodes.title: Maximum Homerdrive

Episodes.description: Three famous religious stories are retold Simpsons style as the family nods off at church.
Episodes.title: Simpsons Bible Stories

Episodes.description: Homer becomes the talk of the Springfield art community when a failed barbecue pit he worked on is mistaken for an art project.
Episodes.title: Mom and Pop Art

Episodes.description: Bart is punished with community service at the Retirement Castle after he ruins Springfield's chances of hosting the Olympics.
Episodes.title: The Old Man and the "C" Student

Episodes.description: Mr. Burns attempts to be popular by capturing the Loch Ness Monster.
Episodes.title: Monty Can't Buy Me Love

Episodes.description: Lisa is invited to join the Springfield chapter of MENSA and after Mayor Quimby flees, the group ends up running the city. Meanwhile, Homer poses for a series of erotic photos.
Episodes.title: They Saved Lisa's Brain

Episodes.description: The Simpsons must perform on a Japanese game show after Homer loses their money on a vacation.
Episodes.title: Thirty Minutes Over Tokyo
